thread.title: NASA post sparks wild alien theories
thread.title_full: NASA post sparks wild alien theories

title: NASA post sparks wild alien theories
text:
A mysterious NASA post has prompted ridiculous alien conspiracy theories February 22, 2017 10:41am news.com.au 
A MYSTERIOUS NASA tweet has prompted wild theories about whether humans have finally gotten in touch with aliens. 
In a tweet posted this morning, the space agency said it will make an announcement tomorrow about a ‚Äúdiscovery beyond our solar system‚Äù. New discovery! We're announcing new findings on planets orbiting other stars tomorrow at 1pm ET: https://t.co/TMQHR81RRC Q? #askNASA pic.twitter.com/XrGdHJXXmT ‚Äî NASA (@NASA) February 21, 2017 
It didn‚Äôt offer much more detail, other than to say it is specifically related to ‚Äúplanets that orbit stars other than our sun, known as exoplanets‚Äù. 
But as vague as this preview is, it hasn‚Äôt stopped people from launching into conspiracy mode about whether a real-life ET situation is about to unfold. Has Nasa found ALIENS? Space agency to announce ‚Äòdiscovery beyond our solar system‚Äô https://t.co/nlgQ54GE17 pic.twitter.com/18VBTc4zad ‚Äî Daily Express (@Daily_Express) February 21, 2017 @NASA if u see or meet aliens please leave them alone I don't want them here ‚Äî amanda hiskey (@hiskeyamanda) February 21, 2017 @entirelyamelia This so better be aliens. I need to know that there's intelligent life out there...anywhere. ‚Äî not a fan (@jessebeach) February 21, 2017 Will be well gutted if nasa's announcement tomorrow isn't about aliens üôÑ ‚Äî Hayley McQueen (@HayleyMcQueenx) February 21, 2017 This NASA announcement better be aliens. NASA: huge announcement about spaceeveryone: omg it's aliens it's got to be aliensNASA, invariably: water used to be at this place 
The news outlet Express even devoted a whole article to it, entitled: ‚ÄúHas Nasa found ALIENS? Space agency to announce ‚Äòdiscovery beyond our solar system‚Äù. 
Look guys, we‚Äôd love for it to be aliens too, but it‚Äôs probably safe to assume it won‚Äôt be quite that dramatic. 
But hey, exoplanets are still pretty exciting, right? 
The announcement will be streamed at 4am (AEST) tomorrow.
